submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        d = [0] * (k + 2)
        for i in range(n//2):
            dd = abs(nums[i] - nums[n-1-i])
            # print(dd)
            m = max(k - min(nums[i], nums[n-1-i]) , max(nums[i], nums[n-1-i]))
            # print(m) 
            d[dd] -= 1
            d[dd+1] += 1
            d[0] += 1
            d[m+1] += 1
            # print(d)
        # print(d)
        ans = inf
        t = 0
        for x in d:
            t += x
            ans = min(ans, t)
        return ans
